scripts.analyze: for D in 'core-module audio-crow midi-gts midi-sgl midi-stm'; do pushd ${D}; npm run analyze; popd; done
scripts.build: for D in 'core-module audio-crow midi-gts midi-sgl midi-stm'; do pushd ${D}; $(npm bin)/tsc run build; popd; done
scripts.commit: for D in 'core-module audio-crow midi-gts midi-sgl midi-stm'; do pushd ${D}; git add .; git status; printf Notes: ; read; git commit -m '${REPLY}'; popd; done
scripts.coverage: for D in 'core-module audio-crow midi-gts midi-sgl midi-stm'; do pushd ${D}; jest --coverage ./test/unit; popd; done
scripts.format: for D in 'core-module audio-crow midi-gts midi-sgl midi-stm'; do pushd ${D}; npm run _prettier; popd; done
scripts.lint: for D in 'core-module audio-crow midi-gts midi-sgl midi-stm'; do pushd ${D}; $(npm bin)/eslint .; popd; done
scripts.lint:fix: for D in 'core-module audio-crow midi-gts midi-sgl midi-stm'; do pushd ${D}; $(npm bin)/eslint .; popd; done
scripts.make: for D in 'core-module audio-crow midi-gts midi-sgl midi-stm'; do pushd ${D}; npm run rebuild; npm run analyze .; popd; done
scripts.push: for D in 'core-module audio-crow midi-gts midi-sgl midi-stm'; do pushd ${D}; git push origin; popd; done
scripts.rebuild: for D in 'core-module audio-crow midi-gts midi-sgl midi-stm'; do pushd ${D}; rm -rf ./dist; rm -f ./.buildcache; npm run build; popd; done
scripts.test: for D in 'core-module audio-crow midi-gts midi-sgl midi-stm'; do pushd ${D}; "$(npm bin)/jest ./test/unit"; popd; done
